transArray.content: Traveling with friends, we stayed at the Orange Hotel next to the Foreign Economic and Trade Center on a rainy dayüè® The water in the shower room was very hot and it was very comfortable after washing. When leaving the store, the front desk clerk also gave me a thoughtful gift bag of snacks and a bottle of mineral water, which was very considerate. Thanks! The food is delivered by a robot, so you don't have to go downstairs to pick up the food yourself, which is super convenient.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for your choice and recognition. Winning the trust and favor of our guests is the principle of hospitality we have always adhered to. To get your favor and such a powerful reply is our greatest support! We are looking forward to meeting you again, and wish you a happy life!
